results.original_title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
results.overview: Doctor Strange, with the help of mystical allies both old and new, traverses the mind-bending and dangerous alternate realities of the Multiverse to confront a mysterious new adversary.
results.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness

results.original_title: The Making of Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
results.overview: Join visionary director Sam Raimi and the cast of the film as they recount their experiences bringing Marvelâ€™s darkest story to life.  From world-building to universe-building, hear first hand accounts from the cast and crew on what it took to design, create and make each universe unique and believable.
results.title: The Making of Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
